name: super-express-cli
description: super-express-cli is a powerful command-line tool that simplifies the process of creating new Express.js applications. With just a few simple commands, you can generate a new application with a basic file structure and pre-configured settings, including middleware and a sample endpoint. super-express-cli is the perfect tool for developers who want to save time and quickly get started with building their Express.js applications.
author: shekhar
